text: Adam Basanta (born 1985) is a Canadian sound artist and experimental composer. ==Work== Basanta most often makes sound sculptures. In 2013 Basanta got a honorable mention in the Hybrid Art category at the Prix Ars Electronica. ==Shows== Basanta's work has been shown in Canada Prague, New York City and London. ==References== Category:1985 births Category:Living people Category:21st-century composers Category:Canadian composers
title: Adam Basanta
